# orientationTransform(for:)

**Instance Method**

The affine transform for changing the image to the given orientation.

## Declaration

```swift
func orientationTransform(for orientation: CGImagePropertyOrientation) -> CGAffineTransform
```

## Discussion

Returns a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CGAffineTransform] for the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ImageIO/CGImagePropertyOrientation] value to apply to the image.

## Working with Orientation

- **oriented(_:)**: Transforms the original image by a given orientation.
